module.name: ppp
module.summary: Point to Point Protocol daemon creates links in ppp networks

interface.name: ppp_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to inherit and use PPP file discriptors.

interface.name: ppp_sigchld
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to PPP.

interface.name: ppp_signal
interface.summary: Send a generic signal to PPP.

interface.name: ppp_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute domain in the ppp domain.

interface.name: ppp_run_cond
interface.summary: Conditionally execute ppp daemon on behalf of a user or staff type.

interface.name: ppp_run
interface.summary: Unconditionally execute ppp daemon on behalf of a user or staff type.

interface.name: ppp_exec
interface.summary: Execute domain in the ppp caller.

interface.name: ppp_manage_pid_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete PPP pid files.

interface.name: ppp_pid_filetrans
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete PPP pid files.

desc.p: Allow pppd to load kernel modules for certain modems
Allow pppd to be run for a regular user
